data.message: I have noticed very unusual behavior on Lindsey Keune's Facebook account and unusual posts from different people. Her account has been hacked and has access to her account. I would appreciate it if you could close down her account so no activity is on her account.

replies.message: Hi Michael. If you believe a friend’s account has been hacked, show them this page: http://bit.ly/2er8Lzo. By following the steps outlined, we’ll be able to provide better help in resolving this issue. -Nick
Facebook I was hacked on a friends fb page,  now I am afraid to respond to any of her posts.  What should I do??

Hi Maggie. If your friend can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/2eLIcHy to get immediate help. You can also encourage them to visit Privacy Basics at http://bit.ly/2eLM77b for tips and guides to help them keep their account secure. -Nick

Facebook you are allowing someone to dox my profile and pictures and refuse to do anything about it! At least 10 people have reported it and you say it doesn't violate anything. It's my PHOTO AND INFORMATION being doxxed. IT's cyber bullying and I've not not gotten a job because of her public post. Please help me.
